makeAMove() - Method in class clients.ControlCentreStub
Stub entity to represent the will of the last HorseJockey to Make a Move and inform so on the ControlCentre.
makeAMove() - Method in class hippodrome.ControlCentre
Signal given the last horse has crossed the finish line, notifying the ControlCentre.startTheRace() in order to relief the Broker from the state Supervising the Race (STR), as the race is over.
makeAMove() - Method in interface hippodrome.ControlCentreInterface
 
makeAMove(int) - Method in class clients.RacingTrackStub
Stub entity to represent the will of a HorseJockey to Make a Move on the the RacingTrack.
makeAMove(int) - Method in class hippodrome.RacingTrack
Let a pair Horse/Jockey horse make a move on the track, accordingly to its abilities to move.
makeAMove(int) - Method in interface hippodrome.RacingTrackInterface
 
markFinalPosition(int) - Method in class hippodrome.RacingTrack
Marks the final position of the pair Horse/Jockey identified with horse.
Message - Class in communications
Definition of the processing of information relative to the Message's exchanges between clients (also known as entities) and the servers (also known as hippodrome regions).
Message(MessageType) - Constructor for class communications.Message
Constructs a message which is only defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType).
Message(MessageType, boolean) - Constructor for class communications.Message
Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType) and a boolean value.
Message(MessageType, int) - Constructor for class communications.Message
Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType) and one integer value.
Message(MessageType, int, int) - Constructor for class communications.Message
Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType) and two integer values.
Message(MessageType, int, int, int) - Constructor for class communications.Message
Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType) and two integer values.
Message(MessageType, int, HorseJockeyState) - Constructor for class communications.Message
Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType), one pair Horse/Jockey identification and one pair Horse/Jockey state value defined as HorseJockeyState.
Message(MessageType, int, SpectatorState) - Constructor for class communications.Message
Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType), one Spectator identification and one Spectator state value defined as SpectatorState.
Message(MessageType, BrokerState) - Constructor for class communications.Message
Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType) and one Broker state value defined as BrokerState.
Message(MessageType, Race) - Constructor for class communications.Message
Constructs a message which is defined by its type (as an object of type MessageType and a Race.
MessageType - Enum in communications
Definition of the various types of the Messages processed in Message.
MessageType() - Constructor for enum communications.MessageType
 
money - Variable in class entities.Spectator
Current amount of this Spectator's money to spend on new bets.
MONEY_MAX_BOUND - Static variable in class configurations.SimulationConfigurations
Maximum amount of money a Spectator could have.
MONEY_MIN_BOUND - Static variable in class configurations.SimulationConfigurations
Minimum amount of money a Spectator could have.
moneyOnSafe - Variable in class hippodrome.BettingCentre
Internal attribute of the Betting Centre which represents the amount of money which we have on our account, to perform the bets from the Spectator's.
